title: Murder in the U.S. : number of victims by race/ethnicity and gender 2018
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 8 different Races on X-axis for 4 groups Total, Male, Female, and Unknown. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of victims.
Out of all 4 groups, Total had the highest Number of victims in Race Total and Unknown had the lowest Number of victims in Race Hispanic or Latino.
Among all the Races, Unknown had the highest Number of victims 29.0 in Race Total and lowest value 0.0 in Race Hispanic or Latino.
The maximum Number of victims for Unknown that was found in Race Total was 0 times larger than the minimum Number of victims observed in Race Hispanic or Latino.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Number of victims on the Y-axis for 8 different Races for 4 groups Total, Male, Female, and Unknown that are presented on the X-axis.
In Race Total, Total had the highest Number of victims 14123.0 among the 4 groups and in Hispanic or Latino, Unknown had the lowest Number of victims 0.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 8 different Races on X-axis for 4 groups Total, Male, Female, and Unknown. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of victims.
Out of all 4 groups, Total had the highest Number of victims in Race Total and Unknown had the lowest Number of victims in Race Hispanic or Latino.
Among all the Races, Unknown had the highest Number of victims 29.0 in Race Total and lowest value 0.0 in Race Hispanic or Latino.
The maximum Number of victims for Unknown that was found in Race Total was 0 times larger than the minimum Number of victims observed in Race Hispanic or Latino.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 8 different Races on X-axis for 4 groups Total, Male, Female, and Unknown. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of victims.
Out of all 4 groups, Total had the highest Number of victims in Race Total and Unknown had the lowest Number of victims in Race Hispanic or Latino.
In Race Total, Unknown had the highest Number of victims among all 8 Races and it has the lowest Number of victims in Race Hispanic or Latino.
The maximum Number of victims for Unknown that was found in Race Total was 0 times larger than the minimum Number of victims observed in Race Hispanic or Latino.
Out of all 4 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Number of victims was found in case of Total.

In Race Total, Total had the highest Number of victims 14123.0 among the 4 groups and in Hispanic or Latino, Unknown had the lowest Number of victims 0.0. The second highest Number of victims 3180.0 was observed for Total in Race Total.
On average, the Race Total had the highest Number of victims for all 4 groups Total, Male, Female, and Unknown. Whereas Unknown race had the lowest average Number of victims.
